dimension: 10 3/4 x 6 1/4 x 5 in. (27.31 x 15.88 x 12.7 cm) (includes finial)
title: Hot water jug
description: hot water jug, urn shape with line of beading around edge of base, top of body and top; finial is an inverted pineapple; black wood handle attached to body by a shell at top
creditline: Gift of Mrs. John Crosby in memory of Mrs. Albert W. Hastings
